alert.note: Alert for Cass; Gage; Johnson; Lancaster; Otoe (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 3:56AM CDT until June 30 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lancaster County in southeastern Nebraska... Northwestern Johnson County in southeastern Nebraska... Western Otoe County in southeastern Nebraska... Northeastern Gage County in southeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Cass County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 355 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southeast of Walton, or 9 miles southeast of Lincoln, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Eagle around 400 AM CDT. Palmyra around 410 AM CDT. Elmwood around 415 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Unadilla, Syracuse and Avoca. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 409 and 415. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
